articles.description: With India Inc entering the last leg of earnings season and Diwali cheer in the air, it will be crucial to see if markets are able to sustain the positive momentum
articles.content: The markets had begun the week on a rather cautious note, but shrugged off  the weakness by the end of it, riding on the dovish stand taken by the Federal Reserve in keeping the US policy rates uncha… [+7754 chars]

articles.title: 9 legendary mithai shops in India to shop from this Diwali festive season - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The ubiquitous barfis and pedhas, katlis and kulfis from these good old mithai makers are still the real deal.
articles.content: While chocolates are great, nothing says festivities and celebrations as much as a box of good old mithai. Desi desserts are an integral part of life in India. Whether its a festival, marriage ceremo… [+6189 chars]

articles.author: Siddhi Nayak
articles.title: India's Bank of Baroda ends employment of key official after mobile app deficiencies - Reuters.com
articles.description: India's Bank of Baroda said on Saturday it had terminated the employment of its chief digital officer as part of action after the central bank found deficiencies in its mobile app, although the employee said it was his decision to leave.
articles.content: MUMBAI, Nov 5 (Reuters) - India's Bank of Baroda said on Saturday it had terminated the employment of its chief digital officer as part of action after the central bank found deficiencies in its mobi… [+2433 chars]
